accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research use.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The materials from Washington and Lee University Special Collections are made available for use in research, teaching, and private study, pursuant to U.S. Copyright law. The user assumes full responsibility for any use of the materials, including but not limited to, infringement of copyright and publication rights of reproduced materials. Any materials used should be fully credited with the source. Permission for publication of this material, in part or in full, must be secured with the Head of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of Item], Music: Songs, RHS Coll. 0092, Special Collections and Archives, James G. Leyburn Library, Washington and Lee University, Lexington, VA. In some cases the citation format may vary. Please contact Special Collections' staff to verify the appropriate format.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes one file of sheet music, including a song entitled "Lexington" by Leslie Lyle Campbell, "The Marvelous Music Prodigy, Blind Tom, the Negro Boy Pianist," a book of Banjo Music for G.D. Letcher, and early 20th century dance scores and instructions.
Includes a Southern States Cooperative brochure, "Let's Sing," Southern States Book of Songs, no date.
